attributes.action: Stop plans to levy the £6 tax on landline phones
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
stop this crazy idea now people are fed up with being taxed while mps get away with everthing under the sun.
I for 1 will not pay a £6 levy on a landline phone I would rather do without

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
